title: PYT with A Scary Old Man
itunes:title: PYT with A Scary Old Man
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am the pretty young thing that wrote you about my lover that is the same age as my father. I took Shirley’s advice and asked my lover if the relationship was going anywhere or if it was just a fling. He told me that in due time our relationship would get to the next level. I didn’t like his answer, so I broke it off with him. Two days later, he sent flowers to my job and my house. I still ignored him..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Dear Steve and Shirley, I am the pretty young thing that wrote you about my lover that is the same age as my father. I didn’t like his answer, so I broke it off with him. Two days later, he sent flowers to my job and my house. I still ignored him..................
